Text: Friendship Hall is a historic home located at East New Market, Dorchester County, Maryland.

Text: Friendship Hall:  It is a Georgian-style brick dwelling.

Text: Friendship Hall:  It consists of a large five-bay, two-story main block built about 1790; a two-bay one-story passage; and a 1⁄-story kitchen wing.
